item.title: Unal Admission
item.description: Some context When we get closer to finishing high school, a very important decision comes to mind… what the hell am I going to do with the rest of my life. A lot of Colombian high school graduates have a dream or goal: to be accepted into the National University of Colombia. My experience First try (I know, not very motivating) So I had that dream too. When I was in tenth grade, I began preparing myself thanks to the advices of my cousin who was a student at UNAL.
